dashboard.label: Misc New Features Copy
dashboard.description: Create dashboards for all new data sources
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_chart_1":{"type":"splunk.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"Macros","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true},"context":{}},"viz_chart_2":{"type":"splunk.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"Active Minutes","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true,"stackMode":"stacked"},"context":{}},"viz_single_1":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"drilldown":"none"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_3"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"Calories Out"},"viz_single_2":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"drilldown":"none"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_4"},"title":"Calories In"},"viz_chart_3":{"type":"splunk.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_5"},"showProgressBar":true,"options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true},"context":{}}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:food logId!=logId 
| chart sum(protein) AS Protein, sum(carbs) AS Carbohydrates, sum(fat) AS Fat by _time","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-30d@d","latest":"now"}}},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:activity:* 
| rex field=source ":(?<source_short>[^:]+)$"
| chart sum(value) as minutes by date, source","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-30d@d","latest":"now"}}},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:calories" level!=level
| stats sum(value) AS CaloriesOut by date 
| eval "Calories Out"=round(CaloriesOut,0)
| chart values("Calories Out")","queryParameters":{"earliest":"1665730800","latest":"1665817200"}}},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:food logId!=logId 
| chart sum(calories) AS "Calories In" by _time","queryParameters":{"earliest":"1665730800","latest":"1665817200"}}},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:food" logId!=logId
| stats sum(calories) by _time
| apply Calorie_Smart_Forecast","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_67m7Aoxz":{"options":{"defaultValue":"-24h@h,now","token":"tr_Q19twrD9"},"title":"Time Range Input Title","type":"input.timerange"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":1000},"structure":[{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":250,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_single_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":500,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_single_2","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":500,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_3","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":750,"w":1200,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":["input_67m7Aoxz"]},"description":"Create dashboards for all new data sources","title":"Misc New Features Copy"}
